biotools.summary: A web-based tool to assess the dual-use potential of life science research. The aim of the tool is to provide a clear and practical dual-use risk assessment of research concerned and to create dual-use awareness amongst life-science researchers, as explicitly stated in the WHO Benchmarks for International Health Regulations Capacities.

bioschemas.name: Dual-Use Quickscan
